memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and discovered he's the mafioso. We should vote for him to protect the town."
Diana: "Alice, that's a very bold claim to make so early. If you're really the detective, why would you reveal yourself so openly on Day 1? This seems risky."
Charlie: "Alice, are you sure about that? Revealing yourself as detective on day one seems suspicious—maybe you're the mafioso trying to frame me."

You: "I stand by my investigation—Charlie is the mafioso. Revealing early was necessary after Bob's death; we can't risk another night. Diana, trust me—we vote him out to win."
